name: Canned Nightmares
description:
Entry in the Paint Jam 2021, my first attempt at a Jam using Unity. Not finished, will continue working on it later, after the jam ended.

I don't even know if it loads properly, but I am proud of actually doing this, I will give myself an extended deadline until tomorrow for my personal success, but just ignore it for ratings, it's far from finished.

Note: Actual Suggested price is 24¢, the price of a can of Campbell's soup in 1982

Challenges

  • Make all your own sound effects using only sounds you can make with your mouth. Onomatopoeia recommended.
  • Only use the default MS Paint color palette.
  • Make a 3D game only using flat images. No meshes except for like the world/levels. Not a 3D guy
  • Use only comic sans for any in-game font.
  • Draw your assets without a drawing tablet. I don't have one, so, easy.
  • Try to make the title/logo without any real type/font. Handmade
  • Draw all of your art with your eyes closed.
  • Only use the pencil tool.
  • No transparencies.
